shortdesc.ph: Sets the data format for the callback.

section.p: You need to register the callback when calling the method. After successfully registering the audio observer, the SDK triggers this callback. You can set the audio format in the return value of this callback.
section.note: The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the you set in the return value and triggers the callback accordingly. The formula for calculating the sampling interval is: Sampling interval (seconds) = samplePerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds.
